Title: The Caddy
Plot: Kramer befriends a caddy, who helps him to improve his golf game and offer his other advice. George's bosses consider him for a promotion when they think he is so dedicated to his work that he is there in the morning before everyone else and still there after they all leave. They don't know that he's just been leaving his car in the parking lot waiting for his free visit from a locksmith. GuestStars: Jerry Stiller, Estelle Harris, Heidi Swedberg, Phil Morris, John O'Hurley, Larry David, Richard Herd, Brenda Strong, Armin Shimerman, Arthur Rosenberg, Cynthia Madvig, Marilyn Tokuda
